message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product for $1,300,000. I believe it's a fair price, considering its worth to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,100,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position. While $1,100,000 is tempting, it falls short of what I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,150,000.  Let's make this happen!
Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $1,150,000. I would like to propose $1,125,000 as my final offer.
